Questionnaire item keys

Source: R/fokus.gen.R
q_item_keys.Rd

A tibble of item keys supported in the raw FOKUS questionnaire data.

Format

A tibble.

See also

Other FOKUS metadata functions: all_argument_sides, all_ballot_dates, all_ballot_types, all_cantons, all_lvls, all_postal_dispatch_types, all_postal_dispatch_ways, all_prcds, all_proposal_types, all_response_option_types

Examples

fokus:::q_item_keys
#> # A tibble: 23 × 9
#>    key       is_scalar is_iterator is_excluder is_optional type  default remarks
#>    <chr>     <lgl>     <lgl>       <lgl>       <lgl>       <chr> <chr>   <chr>  
#>  1 lvl       FALSE     TRUE        FALSE       FALSE       char… "\"?\"" "polit…
#>  2 i         FALSE     TRUE        FALSE       FALSE       inte… "NA_in… "2nd-l…
#>  3 j         FALSE     TRUE        FALSE       FALSE       inte… "NA_in… "3rd-l…
#>  4 block     TRUE      FALSE       FALSE       FALSE       char… "*top-… "holds…
#>  5 variable… TRUE      FALSE       FALSE       FALSE       char… "\"???… "aka \…
#>  6 who       TRUE      FALSE       FALSE       FALSE       char… "\"all… "aka \…
#>  7 topic     TRUE      FALSE       FALSE       TRUE        char…  NA     "aka \…
#>  8 question… TRUE      FALSE       FALSE       TRUE        char…  NA     "1st-p…
#>  9 question… TRUE      FALSE       FALSE       TRUE        char…  NA     "2nd-p…
#> 10 question  TRUE      FALSE       FALSE       TRUE        char…  NA     "last-…
#> # … with 13 more rows, and 1 more variable: default_val <list>
